statistic-enable.description: Whether BD statistics measurement is enable.

statistic-discard.description: Whether BUM discard statistics collection is enabled.

mac-aging-time.description: MAC address aging time, 0 indicates that MAC addresses do not age.

vlan-list.description: VLAN list. The VLAN is already created globally.

ac-suppression.description: Statistics of the bridge domain AC suppression.
